questions.englishQuestion: Can you briefly introduce yourself and your experience as an SAP FICO consultant?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你能简要介绍一下自己以及作为SAP FICO顾问的经验吗？

questions.englishQuestion: What motivated you to specialize in SAP FICO, and what aspects of FICO do you enjoy the most?
questions.chineseTranslation: 是什么促使你专注于SAP FICO领域？你最喜欢FICO的哪些方面？

questions.englishQuestion: Could you highlight one project that best demonstrates your FICO expertise?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你能重点介绍一个最能体现你FICO专业能力的项目吗？

questions.englishQuestion: How do you keep your FICO knowledge up-to-date with new SAP releases?
questions.chineseTranslation: 随着SAP新版本的发布，你如何保持自己的FICO知识与时俱进？

questions.englishQuestion: Can you describe the most challenging SAP FICO implementation you have worked on? What was your role?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你能描述一下你参与过的最具挑战性的SAP FICO实施项目吗？你的角色是什么？

questions.englishQuestion: How did you handle a situation where the project scope changed significantly during an FICO rollout?
questions.chineseTranslation: 在FICO系统上线过程中，当项目范围发生重大变化时，你是如何处理的？

questions.englishQuestion: Can you give an example of a process improvement you implemented in a previous FICO project?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你能举一个在之前的FICO项目中，你实施的流程改进案例吗？

questions.englishQuestion: Have you ever had to integrate SAP FICO with other modules (like SD or MM)? How did you handle the integration?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你是否有过将SAP FICO与其他模块（如SD或MM）集成的经验？你是如何处理集成工作的？

questions.englishQuestion: Can you explain the difference between a primary and a secondary cost element in SAP CO?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你能解释一下SAP CO中初级成本要素和次级成本要素的区别吗？

questions.englishQuestion: How do you configure a dunning procedure in Accounts Receivable?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你如何在应收账款（AR）中配置催款程序？

questions.englishQuestion: What is the difference between asset acquisition and asset retirement in Asset Accounting (AA)?
questions.chineseTranslation: 在资产会计（AA）中，资产购置和资产报废的区别是什么？

questions.englishQuestion: How would you troubleshoot a discrepancy between GL and subledger in SAP FICO?
questions.chineseTranslation: 在SAP FICO中，当总账（GL）和子ledger存在差异时，你会如何排查问题？

questions.englishQuestion: Explain the difference between order settlement and allocation in Controlling.
questions.chineseTranslation: 解释一下控制模块（CO）中订单结算和分配的区别。

interviewContents.interviewStage: 真实场景问题 (Real project scenarios / Interaction with key users)

questions.englishQuestion: A key user complains that the month-end closing takes too long. How would you investigate and propose a solution?
questions.chineseTranslation: 一位关键用户（Keyuser）抱怨月末结账耗时过长，你会如何调查并提出解决方案？

questions.englishQuestion: The finance director wants a report showing profit by product line, but the system doesn’t have a standard report. How would you handle it?
questions.chineseTranslation: 财务总监需要一份按产品线显示利润的报告，但系统中没有标准报告，你会如何处理？

questions.englishQuestion: During a project, the business wants to change the chart of accounts mid-implementation. How would you manage this request?
questions.chineseTranslation: 在项目实施过程中，业务方希望修改会计科目表，你会如何管理这个需求？

questions.englishQuestion: How do you handle conflicts between key users’ requirements and SAP best practices?
questions.chineseTranslation: 当关键用户（Keyuser）的需求与SAP最佳实践发生冲突时，你会如何处理？

interviewContents.interviewStage: 反问环节 (Candidate questions / Reverse questions)

questions.englishQuestion: Can you tell me more about the typical SAP FICO projects your company handles?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你能多介绍一下贵公司常见的SAP FICO项目类型吗？

questions.englishQuestion: How does your team handle SAP upgrades and new module implementations?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你们团队是如何处理SAP升级和新模块实施工作的？

questions.englishQuestion: What are the biggest challenges your FICO consultants face on projects?
questions.chineseTranslation: 你们的FICO顾问在项目中面临的最大挑战是什么？

questions.englishQuestion: Are there opportunities to get involved in cross-functional projects with other SAP modules?
questions.chineseTranslation: 有机会参与其他SAP模块的跨职能项目吗？
